title: Black screen after alt+tabing client
body: If i'm in the client, and then click away, or game starts, my screen goes black for 1-2 seconds, it gets very annoying, for example, if im trying to call my friends on facebook to the game, and i have to wait so many times, for this. anyone know any solution?

replies.body:
This is known as the "Black Screen of Doom" MWAHHAHAH {{champion:57}} 

Just kidding. This error is usually caused by a bad connection between client and Server. It's pretty quick to fix if you run through the steps provided in our [Connection KB](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). Let me know if the guide doesn't resolve this issue and i'll be sure to look into alternative fixes for your client!
im not sure, about connectivity issues, that may cause problems to my brother's pc aswell, right? but he doesnt have my issue.

It's not an Internet Connection that is causing the issue. When the Client isn't able to connect to the game Server then issue like high ping, freezing, and other atrocities can occur. We don't want that. Running through the steps in that guide can usually eliminate those issues and stabilize that connection. Are you still having issues at this time?
